com.tplmaps.sdk.places

Class SearchManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tplmaps.sdk.places.SearchManager

  • public class SearchManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class to provide Search API related functionality to the user.

    To implement search user need to follow these steps:

    1. Add <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> in your manifest under <manifest> tag
    2. Add <meta-data android:name="com.tplmaps.android.sdk.API_KEY" android:value="YOUR_API_KEY" /> along with you API_KEY in your manifest under <application> tag
    3. Initialize an instance of SearchManager class
    4. Add a listener of your class with the instance by calling SearchManager#setListener(OnSearchResult)
    5. Call request(Params, OnSearchResult) method by setting at least Params.query
    You will get response callbacks in your listener.

    Note: Call request(Params, OnSearchResult) for search query after an interval of minimum 3 seconds because of network limitations applied on our servers otherwise all your request will be suspended

    Since:
    Feb, 2017

    • Method Detail

      • request

        public void request(@NonNull
                    Params params,
                    @NonNull
                    OnSearchResult listener)
        Call this method by passing mandatory Params while making request for a query string. Make sure that you're not requesting before 3 seconds(3000ms), your request will be suspended otherwise. You will get results in corresponding callback method of OnSearchResult listener interface.
        Parameters:
        params - an instance of Params
        listener - an instance of OnSearchResult

      • cancelPendingRequests

        public void cancelPendingRequests()
        To cancel all pending requests. When invoked and there are some pending requests, you will get callbacks for all those pending requests in interface method OnSearchResult.onSearchRequestCancel(Params, long) only when the listener is registered through RetrofitHelper.setListener(OnSearchResult)

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Remove listener

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
